httpProxy
service in module environment

Description

wrap common call (GET ...) to the backend , prefixing backendUrl and getting data out of response

Methods

  • get(uri, opts)

    wrap GET call

    Parameters
    ParamTypeDetails
    uriString

    the absolute uri to pass to the backend

    optsObject

    options to pass to $http.get

    Returns
    httpPromise

    of the returned response.data
